entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming east 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
